metadata.title: CVE-2017-6301 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in ytnef before 1.9.1. This is related to a patchdescribed as "4 of 9. Out of Bounds Reads."

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6301` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libytnef0 - 1.5-9ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libytnef package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.5-9ubuntu0.1').
